options_StopUpdates.message: Clear window titles and prevent further updates

options_MinTime.message: Minimum time between window title updates:

options_AllowInPrivateWindows.message: Don't count tabs in private windows and don't set title's for private windows.

options_FormatPlaceholders_TabCount.message: %TabCount%: Number of tabs in the current window.

options_FormatPlaceholders_TotalTabCount.message: %TotalTabCount%: Total number of tabs in all windows.
